content.prompt: Both of the authors dealt with the issue of slavery in the context of the

choices.label: growth of a new consumer culture in Europe
decline of the Portuguese and Spanish empires in the Americas
long period of conflict between France and Britain
industrialization of the British and French economies

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
